text: I have been experiencing increased urination, constant thirst, and unexpected weight loss despite normal appetite.
label: Diabetes Mellitus

text: I'm feeling sharp chest pain that gets worse when I breathe deeply or cough, along with shortness of breath and fever.
label: Pneumonia

text: I've been having severe headaches, confusion, nausea and vomiting. My vision is also blurry.
label: Meningitis

text: I have a persistent dry cough, shortness of breath, especially during physical activities, and wheezing when I exhale.
label: Asthma

text: My joints are swollen and painful, especially in the morning. I feel stiff for more than an hour after waking up.
label: Rheumatoid Arthritis

text: I've been experiencing heartburn, acid regurgitation, and difficulty swallowing. It gets worse after eating.
label: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)

text: I have redness and itching on my skin with raised, red bumps that come and go.
label: Hives

text: I've been feeling extremely tired, have dark urine, yellowing of my eyes and skin, and abdominal pain.
label: Hepatitis

text: I've had diarrhea, abdominal cramping, and bloating that gets worse after eating certain foods containing gluten.
label: Celiac Disease

text: I've been experiencing dizziness, ringing in my ears, and hearing loss in one ear.
label: Meniere's Disease

text: I've had a sore throat, difficulty swallowing, swollen tonsils with white patches, and fever.
label: Strep Throat

text: I've been experiencing palpitations, shortness of breath, chest discomfort, and dizziness.
label: Atrial Fibrillation

text: I have a painful, blistering rash in a band on one side of my body along with fever and headache.
label: Shingles

text: I've been having frequent, urgent urination with burning sensation and cloudy, strong-smelling urine.
label: Urinary Tract Infection

text: My hands and feet feel numb and tingling, I'm often thirsty, have blurry vision, and wounds heal slowly.
label: Diabetes Mellitus

text: I've been experiencing pain and stiffness in my lower back and hips, especially in the morning or after inactivity.
label: Ankylosing Spondylitis

text: I have severe abdominal pain that radiates to my back, along with nausea, vomiting, and fever.
label: Pancreatitis

text: I've been having recurrent episodes of severe headache on one side of my head, with nausea and sensitivity to light.
label: Migraine

text: I have a persistent cough with blood-tinged sputum, chest pain, weight loss, and night sweats.
label: Tuberculosis

text: I've been experiencing memory loss, confusion, difficulty completing familiar tasks, and changes in mood and personality.
label: Alzheimer's Disease
